title: Best of Alka Yagnik | Evergreen Bengali Movie Video Songs | Alka Yagnik Hit Songs
description:
Here we bring you the finest romantic hit songs of our favourite singer "Alka Yagnik". Listen and Enjoy!!! Do not forget to "Subscribe" to our channel and leave a chance to get more nostalgic with memories.

Songs::
Kono Dino Bhabini Jaa(0:15)
Jhal Legeche Amar Jhal Legeche(04:03)
Tumi Amar Sudhu Amar(09:03)
Phool to Amari Chilo(12:30)
Sotti Ki Amake Balo(17:13)
Loke Bole Biye Naki(22:12)
Tumi Aar Ami(27:10)
Phelo Taka Loto Moja(31:11)
Ek Paloker Dekha(35:15)
Katodin Ase Din Kete Jai(40:34)

Song Details:::
Song : Kono Dino Bhabini Jaa
Film : Sindoor Khela
Singer : Amit Kumar, Alka Yagnik
Music Director : Uttam Singh
Lyricist : Pulak Bandopadhyay
Release : 1999
Mood : Happy
Theme : Romantic
Director : Partha Ghosh
Starcast : Prosenjit, Rituparna, Chiranjit, Ranjit Mullick, Johnny Lever & others.

Song Name : Jhal Legeche Amar Jhal Legeche
Artist : Alka Yagnik
Lyricist : Pulak Bandopadhyay

Movie : Badnam
Release : 1990

Mood : Romantic
Theme : Love
Star Cast : Prosenji,Neelam,Shakti Kapoor,Soumitra Banerjee

Song Name : Tumi Amar Sudhu Amar
Singer : Udit Narayan, Alka Yagnik

Director : Narayan Roy
